posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian
$175 for the lot.. the post here that you want them, and send paypal to brian@iwantmycookies.com 







SGC will grae them.. here is the answer i got from SGC this morning







"Hello.  If you want them cut around the shape of the player the fee is $35 per card for (15) business day service.  If you simply want them encapsulated the standard way in a square the minimum fee is $12 per card under the 19th Century (15) business day service.  These cards can't be submitted under any specials.



 



They can be graded numerically if completely intact without tape repairs, etc."







i will accept PayPal only please. cards will ship with Delievery Confirmation.

Posted By: David G
Per our correspondance, payment sent.  thanks
